title: I generally walk for 7km a day, but after vaccination which I took on 24th of this month, I walked 5km yesterday, but I am feeling weak. ...
description: Answer (1 of 10): After vaccination, your immune system gets strongly active which cause some weakness. Let me explain in detail. Generally, two vaccines are currently using in India.
